Class WGlyph

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WRaster
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WRasterMono1
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WGlyph
public class WGlyph extends WRasterMono1
Specialized version of WRasterMono1 used for holding/manipulating a bitmap for a MULTI character. This takes the place of the old Glyph and BitmapGraphic classes for WYSIWYG rendering.
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting
